title: Update site-wide phone number and remove address from UI

requirements.summary: Update all displayed phone numbers and call/WhatsApp links to use +91 77357 05356 with valid tel/wa.me formats across the site.
acceptanceCriteria: All user-visible phone text shows exactly “+91 77357 05356”.
WhatsApp booking button/link uses https://wa.me/917735705356 (with the existing prefilled message preserved).
No remaining instances of the old placeholder number (+1 (234) 567-890 / +1234567890 / 1234567890) exist in the frontend code or rendered UI.

file_operations.description: Create a single source of truth for contact details (display phone text, tel: link value, WhatsApp wa.me link base, and the existing WhatsApp prefilled message) so all pages/sections can reuse consistent formatting.
Replace placeholder tel links in desktop and mobile CTAs with values imported from frontend/src/config/contact.ts so the Call Now button uses tel:+917735705356 and no old phone values remain.
Update the hero Call Now CTA to use the phone values from frontend/src/config/contact.ts (tel:+917735705356) and remove any remaining placeholder phone link value.

Update (1) the WhatsApp booking button to use https://wa.me/917735705356 while preserving the current prefilled message querystring, and (2) the Phone contact card to display exactly “+91 77357 05356” with href tel:+917735705356; source values from frontend/src/config/contact.ts.

Update the footer phone line to display exactly “+91 77357 05356” and (if linked) ensure it uses tel:+917735705356; source values from frontend/src/config/contact.ts, and remove any placeholder phone text.

requirements.summary: Remove all salon address UI content (including labels and map placeholder address text) without breaking layout.
acceptanceCriteria: The Footer no longer displays an “Address:” line.
The Contact/Booking page no longer displays an address section/label/value.
Any text referencing a specific street address (e.g., “123 Style Street…”) is removed from the UI.
The Contact/Booking page still renders correctly without layout breakage after removing address content.

file_operations.description: Remove the address list item/line entirely from the footer contact info so no “Address:” label/value is rendered.

Remove the Address block from the Contact Information card (icon/label/value) and remove the map placeholder caption line that references a street address (e.g., “Visit us at 123 Style Street”); ensure spacing/layout remains visually consistent after removal.
